Job Posting:173889 - Position: W26 Co-Op, SH&E Data & Analytics 173889B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/06/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 09/26/2025 04:21 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Nutrien Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 Co-Op, SH&E Data & Analytics 173889B Co-op Position Saskatoon, SK Canada 12 or 16 months In-Person CAD 23.72 per hour for 0 Major List Nutrien is a leading provider of crop inputs and services, and our business results make a positive impact on the world. Our purpose, Feeding the Future, is the reason we come to work each day. We're guided by our culture of care and our core values: safety, inclusion, integrity, and results. When we say we care, we mean it. We're creating an inclusive workplace where everyone feels safe, has a sense of belonging, trusts one another, and acts with integrity.?? Through the collective expertise of our nearly 26,000 employees, we operate a world-class network of production, distribution, and ag retail facilities. We efficiently serve growers' needs and strive to provide a more profitable, sustainable, and secure future for all stakeholders.? Help us raise the expectation of what an agriculture company can be and grow your career with Nutrien.? This position is an exciting opportunity and will provide invaluable work experience in a growing company. This position is for a New Grad or Co-op beginning in January 2026 and will last approximately 12 to 16 months. This position is required to be on-site and may be located from Calgary, AB, Saskatoon, SK, or Loveland, CO, U.S. What you will do: • Learn the SH&E Vision, Strategy and Actions embedded throughout Nutrien and how the SH&E Team adds value to the organization, industry and community. • Develop an understanding of SH&E and the critical connections we have to protection, reputation, investing, compliance and environmental, social, and governance commitments. • Data Analysis - Support the SH&E Leadership Team through application of analysis, software, modelling, and reporting working closely with Information Technology, cross-functional teams and subject matter experts. • Service Requests / Reporting - Taking direction from the SH&E Analytics Team (daily), the SH&E Governance Team (indirectly) and the SH&E Leadership Team (indirectly) answering requests for service, confirmation of data & information, developing presentations and providing service to ensure Business Unit Decision makers are "Data Informed" Compensation & Benefits: Hourly Rate $23.72/hour. This range is estimated for?Co-Op, SH&E Data & Analytics?in Loveland, Colorado, U.S. Actual salary and benefits may differ based upon location.? We provide an attractive benefits package that includes comprehensive medical, dental, vision coverage, and life insurance and well as disability coverage for positions working more than 30 hours per week. In addition, we have a retirement program that encourages our employees to save for the longer term, with generous matching employer contributions.? Our benefit package also demonstrates our culture of care with paid vacation, sick days and holidays as well as paid personal and maternity/parental leaves and an Employee and Family Assistance Program.? Details of the benefits package will be shared in the application process.?? This information is provided in compliance with applicable state equal pay and pay equity legislation and is the company's good faith and reasonable estimate of the compensation range and benefits offered for this position.? The compensation offered to the successful applicant may vary based on factors including experience, skills, education, location, and other job-related reasons.? Nutrien also makes internal equity a consideration in all pay decisions.?? Ready to make an impact with us? Apply today!?? The estimated salary that Indeed, Glassdoor and LinkedIn lists does not represent Nutrien's compensation structure. Nutrien is an equal opportunity employer.?We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, veteran status, genetic information, and other legally protected categories.??? This job will remain posted until filled. In accordance with Nutrien policies, you will be required to undergo a background check, and may be required to undergo a substance test. While we appreciate all applications we receive, only candidates under consideration will be contacted. Applicants must meet minimum age requirements, as permitted by law.? ? Our Recruitment Process: Application > Resume Review > Pre-screen/Interview > Offer > Pre-Employment Conditions > Welcome to Nutrien? Job Requirements What you will bring: • Currently pursuing a Bachelors or Masters degree in Statistics, Data Science, Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Computer Science or equivalent related program with a graduation date of August 2025 or later Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required?
